com.coyote.drinknomore.harmony.widget

Class DateWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.coyote.drinknomore.harmony.widget.DateWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class DateWidget
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    View for Date selection. This view is composed of a disabled edit text and of an alert dialogs (DatePickerDialog). It is really helpful to let your users chose a date.
